name: Hell Sells
description:
In Hells Sells, you're trying to sell your soul to the devil himself.  Unfortunately, he doesn't want to buy it.  Do favors for your demonic friends in order to increase the value of your soul.  Made in one week for the Combustion Jam, where a new restriction is added every day.

All music was made by me.

All sounds were generated with Bfxr.

All sprites were made by me.

All code was written by me, but some foundational code was taken from earlier projects that were made outside the time frame.

The font is Yoster by codeman38.
